_description: The Sacrament of Matrimony — seven 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) including refrain, ‘Quod Deus coniunxit homo non separet’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Benedicta sit sancta trinitasÞat all this world hath
                    wrowght at will…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…& take this worde to owr socowrQuod deus coniunxit
                        homo non separetExplicit
